A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It's a good movie. Just a bad Star Wars. \nAll the charm from the 7 previous movies is lost and the flick os soaked in these pre-produced forgettable vibe. Character's personalities get rewritten without proper justification and the big moments\, of which there are many\, feel flat and souless. It feels like a good Marvel movie wherein the story is prominsingly structured and the pacing is lighting fast but none of the emotional\, mythological\, epic\, introspective\, frontier-based struggles that are at the core of the Star Wars identity and experience are present.
